VPN Proton: Fast & Secure VPN

Proton VPN is the world's premier free VPN app dedicated to ensuring safety and privacy for its users. Founded by CERN scientists behind Proton Mail, the largest encrypted email service, Proton VPN empowers millions globally with fast, secure, and private access to the internet. With advanced security features and the ability to unblock popular websites and streaming platforms, it stands out as a reliable choice for internet freedom and privacy.

  • Bypass Geo-Restrictions: Smart protocol selection allows you to effortlessly bypass VPN bans and access censored content. üåç
  • High-Speed Servers: Connect to over 10,000 servers across 110+ countries for lightning-fast browsing. ‚ö°
  • Unique Security Features: Includes perfect forward secrecy and always-on VPN capability to keep your internet connection secure. üîê

üíµ Price

Proton VPN is available for free with limited features; however, users can opt for a premium plan that unlocks additional functionalities. In-app purchases may be required for access to the full suite of features, with pricing details dependent on the selected subscription plan.
